explains: adv. 迅速地；活泼地；尖刻地

sentences.en: A trader said gold sold briskly on the local market.
sentences.cn: 一位贸易商说黄金在当地市场的销售很兴旺。

sentences.en: He entered the room briskly and stood near the door.
sentences.cn: 他轻快地进入房间，靠近门站着。

sentences.en: He walked briskly, but without breaking into a trot.
sentences.cn: 他轻快地走着，但没有小跑起来。
